game.name: Who The Fuck Ate Grandma ?
game.shortDescription: Time has come to celebrate Grandma’s 93rd birthday. Everyone has gathered for this memorable family dinner, but unfortunately it looks like Grandma is about to be served for dessert! Inspired by the ’90s, discover a new retro point-and-click adventure game, fully drawn in pixel art.

Inspired by the ’90s, discover a new retro point-and-click adventure game, fully drawn in pixel art.
